title: Creative Inspirations Watercolor Brush Pen Set - Water-Soluble Pens for Painting and Coloring - Set of 48 Assorted Colors
features: FEATURES: Non-toxic, water-based, dye-based ink, 48 Colors, and 2 empty water brushes, Water-soluble blendable colors, Synthetic brush tip for great elasticity and shape retention
PERFECT FOR: Watercolor-style painting, Dry-brush painting, Drawing, sketching, and calligraphy, Blending, shading, and gradients, Urban sketching
DRY OR WATER: Use these water brush pens either dry or dipped in water; Both methods will result in gorgeous brush strokes and blending
Pairs astonishingly well with many of our uniquely designed watercolor pads or journals
This paint brush art set includes 50 pens total; 48 colors and 2 empty pens, and makes great gifts for beginner artists
description: Creative Inspirations Brush Pens spark creativity and make it easy to create beautiful art whenever inspiration strikes. Each pen is filled with water-based ink. The synthetic filament brush tip is flexible, resilient, and has excellent shape retention. By varying stroke pressure, you can create thin or thick lines. All 48 colors are blendable and water-soluble for endless coloring options and effects. Includes two empty water brush pens and the colors Apricot, Ash Blue, Black, Blue Lagoon, Blue Violet, Dark Brown, Deep Violet, Fluorescent Green, Fluorescent Orange, Fluorescent Orange Red, Fluorescent Yellow, Golden, Golden Brown, Grape Purple, Grass Green, Green Gold, Intense Pink, Intense Violet, Jungle Green, Kelly Green, Lemon Yellow, Manganese Blue Violet, Meadow Green, Melon, Military Green, Ocean Blue, Opaline Grey, Orange, Orange Red, Peach, Pink, Pink Balloon, Pink Purple, Red, Red Brown, Rose Violet, Ruby Red, Savannah, Sky Blue, Slate Grey, Teal, Turmeric, Vermilion, Violet, Warm Grey, Wine Red, Yellow Green, and Yellow Ochre. This set makes great gifts for anyone looking for art supplies or a method to begin dry or watercolor painting.
